name of a district in Hebei
market/city/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Fengfeng mine is located in southern Hebei Province, Handan City is one of the major urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 峯峯礦區位於河北省南部，是邯鄲市的重要城區之一。

sentences.english: The characters in planning and design of Congtai pcnjing garden in Handan city are described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了邯鄲市叢臺盆景園規劃設計的特點。

sentences.english: Government officials in Handan also declined to discuss the plant.
sentences.chinese: 邯鄲市政府官員也拒絕討論邯鋼的問題。

sentences.english: Hangang is constructing a new site in Handan.
sentences.chinese: 邯鋼正在邯鄲市建設一個新廠。
